# Notes on ricing
* remove autogenerated comments
* set up monitors
    - ```json
      monitor = [DP-1], 2560x1440@144,1
      ```
* wallpaper
    * hyprpaper.conf
        * wallpaper
            * ```js
            {
            monitor = DP-1
            path = /home/drix/Pictures/Wallpapers/wallpaper.png
            fit_mode = cover
            }
              ```

    - autorun at start
        exec-once = hyprpaper
* waybar
    - config.jsonc & style.css
    - script to reload waybar:
    ```bash
        #!/bin/bash 
        killall -9 waybar
        waybar &
        chmod +x launch.sh - makes executible 
        launch.sh
    ```
